channel.title: channels on wd and cc
channel.description: Recent content in channels on wd and cc

item.title: Django Channels2
item.description: Django 3.0.1 has released for sometime. We still use Django 1.11 in one of our project, with Channels 1.1.8, I think it's the time to upgrade to newest Django and Channels. According this upgrade guide, Channels 2 is a fully rewritten, lots of things has changed. This post is just a record about the upgrade I've done. Routing In Channels 2 you need to add an ASGI_APPLICATION in the settings file, point to the asgi application.
